reviews.sentence: I stayed at the Carlton 25 years ago and then during the war this summer was there for a dinner so I decided to stay for two days during a recent business trip. The room was not well functioning. outdated menues a safe that did not work a drain in the sink that did not work a c heat that did not cool. I was told upon checking in that the gym was open only from 7 am to 7 pm. When I waited entered the gym at 7 am I was told it was open 24 hours though that was not what I was told. I travel endlessly and have stayed in many hotels and exercise in each gym with the same sports clothes so when the attendant told me I could not exercise because my shoes were not acceptable I was a taken aback and not a little annoyed. I offered to sign a waiver but no. The staff was not particularly helpful. All in all I am sorry I stayed there and can not quite imagine going back or recommending anyone I know to stay there. Rick J.

Had a great stay. Stayed for 2 night on the 9th floor. Got a room with sea view. Hotel was very clean great food and very nice staff. One minus point. spa not treatments only sauna are not included for hotel guests.

Excellent Value. Great location. Right on the beach. Excellent breakfast had real honeycomb dripping fresh honey into a bowl. Only downside is breakfast room is in different building however the view of the harbor and sea from that room was worth it. Small fitness center but open 247. Watching the sunrise while on the treadmill was a real treat.

A Must Stay. The hotel is a great location. Lots of outdoor activities from sailing biking swimming paddle boarding. The staff is very accommodating and helpful. The food is very good with lots of choices with a renowned chef. A must stay and will come back.

A fabulous hotel in Tel Aviv. The Carlton was such a wonderful hotel experience. The rooms are beautiful and clean The breakfasts are just amazing. I have never experienced anything so delicious and fresh. The staff was so helpful with any questions that we asked. They were so friendly and kind. The spa facilities were great and I had a wonderful massage. Being so close to the boardwalk was great for walking in the evening and on Shabat. I recommend anyone going to Tel Aviv to stay at this hotel.

Incredible location in incredible city. Our room had a city view unfortunately but we were only in the room to sleep. The hotel sports a great rooftop pool a nice albeit small fitness room a very nice dry sauna wet sauna and shower facility along with massage services two restaurants two bars beachfront location and great service. Rooms are clean spacious and well appointed. Needed improvement is minor and would be a full length mirror in rooms.

Fantastic stay. My husband and I stayed here for 4 nights and absolutely loved it. The service was excellent and rooms a nice size. The highlight is definitely the breakfast which is hosted just over the road. You have a view of the harbour and a buffet breakfast with everything from a bakery frozen yoghurt station and everything else a traditional Israeli breakfast has. The location is central and walking distance to good shopping and restaurants. There is an amazing rooftop pool to break the day of travelling. We also had access to a business lounge which was very convenient. The gym is amazing with views of the sea and great equipment. I even received a personalized note with an energy bar as they knew i frequented the gym the day before. Its the little touches that make this hotel special.

Perfect. Great location with facilities gym swimming pool on the rooftop jacuzi as well. Great breakfast nice rooms friendly staff. fantastic location on the beach and coast promenade. A little bit higher price but in comparision with other in Israel normal.

a Fantastic 4 days in Tel Aviv. The room was great much better than I thought It would be very clean service was excellent. The hotel has a great gym and spa and the swimming pool is outstanding. Breakfast was the best part for me. Each morning I would walk across the street to have breakfast over looking the sea. They have everything you can think of Omelette and waffles was a must. Freshly squeezed orange juice everyday and great cappuccinos.

Beautiful on the beach. this is a clean pretty five star hotel with rooftop pool and jacuzi kosher resturaunt lounge spa and amazing breakfast. the hotel is right on tge beach with stunning views walking distance to other sights bars and restaurants.

Dr. Julieta. I spend 5 exelent days in Carlton hotel and I really enjoy each of them. Amazing service healthy and always fresh food big range of menu great spa zone good gym and of course not forgettable view from my room as well as from any restaurants in the hotel. The main benafit is roof top swimming pool and jakuzy with breathtaking view to the Old City. That ’s something absolutely spectacular. Will definitely come back here with pleasure.

Great hotel Spa package. My friend and I bought the spa package that includes breakfastmasagespa and a pool. I have to say that this hotel takes it to another level. It started with an amazing breakfast with everything there. The service was amazing and you see that they care which is not so easy to find in Israel. Joy took care of us. She has such great energy.
Pleasant. Spa area and the breakfast. Cleaner room hot shower and the bed.
